examples: you have to walk across the stage to get to the john
the hooker who opens her soul to her john

proper noun.description: The name of six kings of Portugal.

origin: Early 20th century (in john (sense 2)): from the given name John, used from late Middle English as a form of address to a man, or to denote various occupations, including that of priest (late Middle English) and policeman (mid 17th century).
